project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement functionality to read a text file and extract words
Implement logic to identify and display the top 10 most common words
Write tests for each of the implemented functionalities
Execute tests to ensure that the word counting and display functionalities work correctly
